name: Slime Lab (Green, the Ninja)
description:
Take control of a small little stickman, and fight some slimes and a boss... which is also a  slime. As my personal project, almost everything is handcrafted by myself (except stuff like the soundfonts and engine — I'm not a masochist).

Controls
  • WASD — Move
  • Shift — Walk
  • Left Click — Attack
  • F4 — Toggle fullscreen

Debug Controls

  • F1 — Teleport to start
  • F2 — Teleport to last checkpoint
  • F3 — Reload scene

Interested in helping with my personal project? Then head over to this survey and provide some feedback! It would be much appreciated.

Special thanks to Godot for making this much easier than it probably would have been otherwise. It's my first time using it, and I only spent about two week's worth of effort on this, including the time I took learning it. As such, things might be sort of janky and there's a lot of spaghetti code.

Game Jolt Mirror: https://gamejolt.com/games/ish-project/782293
